sentences.english: When she was dressed to look like, is a lady.
sentences.chinese: 當她裝扮停當趕到時，看上去儼然是一位貴婦人。

sentences.english: There's a lady in the picture.
She likes men who treat her like a lady .
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡男人把她看做一位貴婦人。

sentences.english: The young lady decked herself up with fine jewels.
sentences.chinese: 這年輕貴婦人戴着精美的珠寶。

sentences.english: The beggar accosted the lady for money.
sentences.chinese: 那乞丐上前向貴婦人討錢。

sentences.english: Providence have make me a lady after a fashion.
sentences.chinese: 天公終於勉強把我造成一位貴婦人。

sentences.english: She was dressed up as a lady of high society.
sentences.chinese: 她把自己打扮成一位貴婦人。

sentences.english: The rich lady raises a pet pig in her living room.
sentences.chinese: 那個貴婦人在起居室養了一隻寵物豬。

sentences.english: A noblewoman saw Karen following after her mother's funeral service.
sentences.chinese: 在她母親葬禮之後，一位貴婦人看到凱倫跟着她。

sentences.english: There is a lady in the picture.

definition: to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
lit. to share the same bed with different dreams (idiom); ostensible partners with different agendas/strange bedfellows/marital dissension
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
variant of 熱衷|热衷[re4 zhong1]
The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction/all the possible schemes and stratagems
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
